snippet: The Tafelmusik Baroque Orchestra offered a program of what its music director called “our favorites of the past 30 years” at Zankel Hall on Monday evening.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews performance by Tafelmusik Baroque Orchestra at Zankel Hall.
lead_paragraph: The Tafelmusik Baroque Orchestra offered a program of what its music director called “our favorites of the past 30 years” at Zankel Hall on Monday evening.

headline.seo: ‘Alcyone’ Emerges From a Tafelmusik Grab Bag
headline.main: A Chance to Hear the Music That Louis XIV Used to Eat Breakfast To
headline.print_headline: A Chance to Hear the Music That Louis XIV Used to Eat Breakfast To
